email_template.name: community_product_submitted
email_template.subject: Community Product Submission for data.gov.my
email_template.content:
Dear {{name}},

Your submission of the community product **{{product_name}}** has been
received for showcasing on <https://data.gov.my>. If it passes moderation
checks (for spam, abuse, violence, etc.), it will be published on our
[Community Products page](https://data.gov.my/community-products).

If the community product is approved, you will be notified at this email. If
rejected, no further notice will be given.

Thank you for contributing to our community showcase.

Warm regards,  
data.gov.my data team

email_template.name: community_product_submitted
email_template.subject: Hantaran Produk Komuniti untuk data.gov.my
email_template.content:
Salam sejahtera {{name}},

Penyerahan produk komuniti **{{product_name}}** anda telah diterima untuk
dipamerkan di <https://data.gov.my>. Sekiranya ia lulus semakan moderasi
(untuk spam, penyalahgunaan, keganasan, dan sebagainya), ia akan diterbitkan
di [halaman Produk Komuniti](https://data.gov.my/community-products) kami.

Sekiranya produk komuniti diluluskan, anda akan dimaklumkan melalui e-mel ini.
Jika ditolak, tiada notis lanjut akan diberikan.

Terima kasih kerana menyumbang kepada pameran komuniti kami.

Sekian, terima kasih.  
Pasukan data.gov.my
